sentences.en: He is a philatelist; part of his collection is rare sets of postage stamps of the Qing Dynasty.
sentences.cn: 他是一位集邮家。他藏品的一部分是罕见的套头的大清国邮票。

sentences.en: I am a committee member of the Philatelist Association of our university.
sentences.cn: 我是我们大学里集邮家协会的成员.

sentences.en: The history of the post office is rarely of interest to anyone but the uniquely eager philatelist.
sentences.cn: 一提到邮局的历史，除了那些特别痴迷的集邮家外，恐怕很难再有谁会感兴趣。

trans.tran_en: A philatelist is a person who collects and studies postage stamps
